name: Computer Search
text: Discard 2 of the other cards from your hand in order to search your deck for any card and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.

effect.text: Discard 2 of the other cards from your hand in order to search your deck for any card and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.

strengths: Can search for ANY card in deck
One of the most powerful search effects
synergies: Combo decks that need specific cards
counters: Lass - Shuffles Trainers back into deck

competitiveHistory: Computer Search was one of the most powerful and versatile cards in the early metagame. Its ability to search for any card made it essential for combo decks.

rulings.ruling: You must discard exactly 2 other cards from your hand to use Computer Search.
You can search for any card, including Pokemon, Trainer, or Energy.
You must shuffle your deck after searching.
